column1: Local Foods////The portions are pretty big; a sandwich and two sides. So we split a delicious truffle egg salad sandwich with a side of kale with golden raisins and a vegetable ratatouille. They were really nice to split it for us since we were sharing. My favorite part is the pretzel bun
column2: it was crunchy with some sweetness. My sister is going back for more later this week.
